product_description: 100 ml grey colored coffee mug with round opening with c shaped handle

copy_data.primary_copy: Start your mornings right with this sleek grey mug that fits perfectly in your hand. Your daily brew deserves the best.
copy_data.headline: Elevate Your Daily Coffee Ritual
copy_data.description: Ergonomically designed 100ml mug combines modern style with perfect portion control. Durable ceramic construction keeps your favorite drink at ideal temperature.
